article_title: #BringBackOurGirls Isn’t Trending Anymore. But the Girls Still Aren’t All Free.
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: While the #BringBackOurGirls campaign brought attention to the more than 250 girls kidnapped by Boko Haram, little progress has been made to save them.
